name: Terrandustry
description: This is the first build of my game so there are still alot of changes and improvements to be made but the general concept of what it could be is there, a first person survival game with a focus on science and automation. The goal of the game is to be a combination of my favorite games(factorio, minecraft, stardew valley) and minecraft mods(thermal series, mekanism, alchemistry and industrial foregoing).
